channel.title: My Ubuntu
channel.description: ok well i just installed Ubuntu and i have to say im loving it, the whole look is awesome, i was wondering, however, has anyone got any software recommendations that would useful for me to have? I've got the ones it comes with and was wondering what else i might need

item.title: My Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Also, get vlc media player.

Read full topic

well what do you need/ what are you looking for?

item.title: My Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

An IDE of your choice, IDEA runs like 10x better on Linux than Windows. Eclipse has a linux version. As does netbeans.

Also, there is a linux equivalent of Notepad++, you can find it here:
http://www.scintilla.org/SciTEDownload.html

You will also need to install plugins for firefox etc.

I have been using Ubuntu for awhile now, so if you have any questions feel free to PM me, or use the ubuntu forums at:
http://ubuntuforums.org

Read full topic
